original_title: Sentados al borde de la mañana con los pies colgando
overview: A group of friends finds a dilapidated place and decide to repair it, paint it and live in it in communal plan. The problem is the bank, owner of the premises, does not want them occupied so they threaten to call the police to evict them.
title: Sentados al borde de la mañana con los pies colgando
